title: Kids Archives - PORTAL MyHEALTH
cleaned_text: problems using writing aids & adaptations](http://www.myhealth.gov.my/en/102975/) Pencil grip in young children follows developmental age of children and may vary between cultures (Tseng,1998). Children commonly begin by holding the pencil with primitive grip and later the pencil grip will be more mature according to the developmental age of the child.
